roleset.name: to give or offer to give voluntarily
roleset.note: VOLUNTEER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'volunteer' based on WSJ; adjectival 'voluntary' based on BOLT-2,3. Member of Vncls captain-29.8, say-37.7. (from volunteer.01-v)

example.name: volunteer-v: transitive
example.text: We will not know until a first generation of female guinea pigs -- [all of whom]-1 [*T*-1]-2 will be more than happy [*-2] to volunteer for the job -- has put the abortion pill through the clinical test of time .

example.name: volunteer-v: all arguments
example.text: Sen. Alan Cranston trekked over to the House side of Capitol Hill a few days ago and volunteered his testimony to fellow Democrat Rep. Henry Gonzalez .
example.arg: to fellow Democrat Rep. Henry Gonzalez

roleset.name: self-initiated
roleset.note: VOLUNTARY-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from voluntary.01-j)

example.name: voluntary-j
example.text: It 's not forced though , it is voluntary .
